title: Lots of Cards Added - T206 Crawford Old Mill
author: Matt

posts.post_title: Lots of Cards Added - T206 Crawford Old Mill
posts.post_content:
Lots of cards added to my [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/mwieder/ForTradeSale"]sale page[/URL].  When looking at any of the cards, click on the magnifying glass icon for a bigger scan.  

Prices are in the album.  Insurance at your option, Paypal add 3%.  

[IMG]http://lh6.ggpht.com/_pAhpQ3jIX9M/SgOrVnk8ISI/AAAAAAAADiM/kde0BMgjj1Q/s576/image-8.jpg[/IMG]

Matt

I'll take the Crawford if still available.

Thanks.

Scott
Scott - it's yours; email sent.  IMO It would have been a 60 if not for the light staining on the back.
